select.name: selFestival
select.sql: SELECT E.EMP_NO as "idEmployee", E.FULL_NAME as "fullName", P.PROJ_NAME as "projName", E.HIRE_DATE as "hireDate", E.SALARY as "salary" FROM EMPLOYEE E join EMPLOYEE_PROJECT EP on E.EMP_NO = EP.EMP_NO join PROJECT P on EP.PROJ_ID = P.PROJ_ID WHERE E.SALARY > ? ORDER BY E.FULL_NAME
